definition: Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

sentences.english: Chen's three sisters and his niece came for the ceremony from Huitong county in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 陳聚志的三個姐姐和侄女特意從湖南會同縣趕來。

sentences.english: I am not worried because I will talk to the supporters.
sentences.chinese: 我並不擔心，因爲我會同尤文球迷進行對話的。

sentences.english: To work with pertinent institutions to prepare funerals for deceased retired cadres and take charge of cadres' posthumous affairs.
sentences.chinese: 會同有關部門辦理離退休幹部的喪葬和善後處理事宜。

sentences.english: As a result, China’s trade surplus will shrink along with its saving rate.
sentences.chinese: 做爲加國，中國的外貿盈餘將會同儲蓄率一起縮水。

sentences.english: Usually [funders] are going to approach the women in a small city.
sentences.chinese: 一般情況下，資助者會同某一小城市的婦女接洽。

sentences.english: The specific areas shall be delimited by the Municipal City Planning Bureau together with the Municipal Greening Administration.
sentences.chinese: 具體範圍由市規劃局會同市綠化局劃定。

sentences.english: Only 10% of those surveyed said they will friend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 只有10%的受訪者表示他們會同任何人交友。

sentences.english: He hung about the entrance all day, hoping for a chance to speak to the director.
sentences.chinese: 他在門口轉悠了一整天，企望有機會同局長談談。

sentences.english: Do you think that I would argue with the next Ballon d'Or winner?
sentences.chinese: 難道你們認爲我會同下一任金球獎得主爭吵嗎？

sentences.english: For removal of extensive post-mediastinum tumors neurosurgeon should coopperate with thoracal surgeon.
sentences.chinese: 認爲胸段突入後縱隔的腫瘤必須會同胸外科聯合手術。

sentences.english: My players will shake hands and swap shirts with their opponents as normal, absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 我的球員肯定還會同往常一樣和對手握手並交換球衣。

sentences.english: The present measures shall be interpreted by the Investment Promotion Bureau of Beibei District together with relevant departments.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法由北碚區招商局會同有關部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: It is my great honor to be given the opportunity to share my experiences at AABC on behalf of the staff.
sentences.chinese: 今天非常榮幸能有機會同各位分享我在亞澳的經歷。

sentences.english: What do you talk to your partner about when you get home from work?
sentences.chinese: 當你下班回家後會同你的夥伴談些什麼呢？

sentences.english: When the painting is finished, your furniture will look as good as new.
sentences.chinese: 上過漆後這傢俱就會同新的一樣。

sentences.english: Specific measures shall be worked out by the Ministry of Machinery in conjunction with the departments concerned.
sentences.chinese: 具體辦法由機械部會同有關部門制定。

definition: to meet/to rendezvous/to merge/to link up/meeting/confluence
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with)/subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself)/belonging to/affiliated/under one's command
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
